abstract: A species may be listed as critically endangered while some populations within its ranks are thriving and some are probably beyond saving.
snippet: A species may be listed as critically endangered while some populations within its ranks are thriving and some are probably beyond saving.
lead_paragraph: A single conservation strategy for a widely distributed species works about as well as a one-size-fits-all pair of sweat pants -- too loose for some people, uncomfortably tight for others.

headline.main: Sharp Variations in Risks to Sea Turtles
